hero.title: Automatic Generation of PDF Diagnostics with AI
description: Imagine engaging your leads with a personalized diagnosis, but without the bottleneck of manual work. This was the challenge.
To solve this, I developed an intelligent automation solution: I used AI to analyze form responses and generate a complete and personalized diagnosis for each lead.

The system completes the process by generating a formatted PDF document from a template and automatically sending it via email. Result: engaged leads with valuable content, delivered in minutes, 24/7, without manual effort from your team.

features.title: Key Features
list: Automatic data capture from forms (Google Forms).
Queue management for reliable diagnosis processing.
Intelligent coordination (AI) of personalized content generation.
Creation of specific analyses and recommendations by AI.
Automatic generation of formatted PDF from a template.
Automated sending of the final report via email.

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.intro: An accounting consultancy sought an innovative and scalable way to engage leads with a personalized and automated diagnosis. The challenge was to create this tool from scratch, ensuring fast delivery and high-quality content, without overburdening the team with manual work.
points: Ensure the AI generated personalized, useful, and strategic analyses and recommendations for each lead.
Automate the filling of a complex template, maintaining the original formatting.
Orchestrate a 100% automated workflow, from data collection to sending the finalized diagnosis.
mission: Structure a reliable and organized automation workflow to manage the generation of the personalized diagnosis by AI.
Develop an effective solution to automatically insert AI analyses into a complex template, preserving all original formatting.
Create a fully automated experience: from clicking the form's 'Submit' button to delivering a professional PDF diagnosis to the lead's email, all within minutes.

beforeAfter.before: The vision: a personalized diagnosis to engage leads, but impractical to execute manually at scale (would require hours per lead).
beforeAfter.after: The reality: a 100% automated system that generates and sends the diagnosis 24/7, turning the idea into a scalable tool.

beforeAfter.before: The risk: leads 'cooling off' due to delays in receiving relevant and personalized content on complex topics.
beforeAfter.after: The result: a high-speed engagement funnel, delivering immediate value (diagnosis in minutes) and qualifying the lead at peak interest.

beforeAfter.before: The uncertainty: how to ensure a consistent standard of analysis and quality if each diagnosis were done manually?
beforeAfter.after: The guarantee: quality standardization via AI, ensuring structure, tone, and business rules are consistently applied across all diagnoses.
